body_html: That's correct, all graph variables are initialized in the Keras session when you run Keras models (or load weights in Keras models), that's intended behavior. Keras simply couldn't work without this behavior (it's impossible to rely on users to explicitly initialize variables that they create themselves before using them together with Keras models).

body: That's correct, all graph variables are initialized in the Keras session when you run Keras models (or load weights in Keras models), that's intended behavior. Keras simply couldn't work without this behavior (it's impossible to rely on users to explicitly initialize variables that they create themselves before using them together with Keras models).
